forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
